title: Bee Hive (item)
summaries: The Bee Hive is a natural trap which spawns over time under Jungle grass ceilings of the Jungle and Underground Jungle. When a Bee Hive is hit, it falls to the ground. Upon impact, it breaks, releasing 2–5 Bees, and, on the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, also has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of releasing a single Hornet.
On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can be crafted and placed manually.
